thread.title: Qatar Airways’ Privilege Club Rewards Fc Barcelona Fans With “Fcb Fan Club”Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Qatar Airways’ Privilege Club Rewards Fc Barcelona Fans With “Fcb Fan Club”Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Qatar Airways’ Privilege Club Rewards Fc Barcelona Fans With “Fcb Fan Club”Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Qatar Airways’ Privilege Club Rewards Fc Barcelona Fans With “Fcb Fan Club”
Qatar Airways, the official airline of FC Barcelona is pleased to announce the launch of the FCB Fan Club exclusively for Privilege Club members. The FCB Fan Club, which follows in the footsteps of the airline’s strategic partnership with the Barcelona football giant, creates an exciting platform to reward loyal football-loving members.
Privilege Club members who subscribe to the Qatar Airways FCB Fan Club can win Economy Class tickets to anywhere in the Qatar Airways network, FCB match tickets, Camp Nou stadium tours, FC Barcelona souvenirs and can benefit from exclusive airline offers. Fan Club membership will also provide an opportunity to view FCB images and videos, match schedules, news and merchandise.
Salam Al Shawa, Qatar Airways Senior Vice President Marketing and Corporate Communications said: “Qatar Airways is pleased to partner with FC Barcelona on this wonderful initiative that brings great benefits to fans of both the airline and the team. We are continuously exploring new and exciting ways to create more involvement for the fans and customers, and to thank them for their dedication and loyalty.”
Ian Di Tullio, Qatar Airways Vice President Customer Relationship Management and Loyalty said: “We would like to thank our Privilege Club members for their loyalty, and could not think of a better way than to partner with FC Barcelona, one of the most popular sports clubs in the world, with their own fiercely loyal following. “We are confident that this partnership will attract new member s to Privilege Club and expose them to a world of benefits not just on Qatar Airways, but throughout the oneworld alliance network.”
Qatar Airways Privilege Club members who subscribe to the FCB Fan Club from now until 10 September 2015 also have the opportunity to win additional exclusive prizes. For more details on the introductory offer, fans are invited to visit qmiles.com.
Joining is free and easy: Visit qmiles.com, join Privilege Club and then subscribe to “FCB Fan Club” from either the pop-up after logging in or from your dashboard.
One of the fastest growing airlines in the world, Qatar Airways has experienced rapid growth in just 18 years of operation. Today it flies a modern fleet of 166 aircraft to 152 key business and leisure destinations across Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Asia Pacific, North America and South America.
Source:- Qatar Airways
